Uses of Class
edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl.Ticks

  • Packages that use Ticks 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl
    Package edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl provides low-level implementation classes for the high-level plotting classes in package edu.rit.numeric.plot.

    • Uses of Ticks in edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl

      Fields in edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl declared as Ticks 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Ticks NumericalAxis.myTicksAboveOrRight
      Ticks above or to the right of the axis.
      protected Ticks NumericalAxis.myTicksBelowOrLeft
      Ticks below or to the left of the axis.
      Methods in edu.rit.numeric.plot.impl that return Ticks 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ticks NumericalAxis.getTicksAboveOrRight()
      Returns the ticks above or to the right of this axis.
      Ticks NumericalAxis.getTicksBelowOrLeft()
      Returns the ticks below or to the left of this axis.
